languages.text: "Я думаю о моем враге. О Немезите. Чем больше я узнаю о нем, тем отчетливее вижу в нем свое смутное отражение. Оскверненное отражение, но... схожее. Ступивший на путь служения с детства. Отсекший все, что препятствует долгу. Воин идеи. Не имеющий ничего кроме нее. Выкованный и закаленный своим наставником".

"I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."
languages.original_text: "Я думаю о моем враге. О Немезите. Чем больше я узнаю о нем, тем отчетливее вижу в нем свое смутное отражение. Оскверненное отражение, но... схожее. Ступивший на путь служения с детства. Отсекший все, что препятствует долгу. Воин идеи. Не имеющий ничего кроме нее. Выкованный и закаленный своим наставником".

traits.locale_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, but... all too similar. Forced to tread the path of servitude from early childhood. Stripped clean of everything that stands in the way of duty. A champion and a zealot with nothing except an idea. Forged and tempered by his mentor."

"I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, but... all too similar. Forged and tempered by his mentor."

Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."

languages.text: "Ich denke an Nemesit, meinen Gegenspieler. Je mehr ich über ihn weiß, desto mehr sehe ich eine vage Entsprechung meiner selbst. Eine kranke Entsprechung vielleicht ... aber nur allzu vertraut. Wie ich war er gezwungen, von Kindheit an den Weg der Dienstbarkeit zu beschreiten, aller Dinge entledigt, die seiner Pflicht im Weg stehen könnten – ein Streiter und Eiferer, dem nichts geblieben war als eine Idee, geschmiedet und gehärtet von seinem Mentor."
languages.original_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke an Nemesit, meinen Gegenspieler. Je mehr ich über ihn weiß, desto mehr sehe ich eine vage Entsprechung meiner selbst. Eine kranke Entsprechung vielleicht ... aber nur allzu vertraut. Wie ich war er gezwungen, von Kindheit an den Weg der Dienstbarkeit zu beschreiten, aller Dinge entledigt, die seiner Pflicht im Weg stehen könnten – ein Streiter und Eiferer, dem nichts geblieben war als eine Idee, geschmiedet und gehärtet von seinem Mentor."

languages.text: «Estoy pensando en Nemesitio, mi adversario. Cuanto más averiguo sobre él, más lo veo como un vago reflejo de mí misma. Un reflejo distorsionado, quizá... pero demasiado familiar. Igual que yo, él se vio obligado a recorrer el camino de la servidumbre desde una edad muy temprana, despojado de todo cuanto pudiese interponerse en el camino del deber; un adalid y fanático al que no le quedaba nada salvo un ideal, forjado y atemperado por su mentor».
languages.original_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy pensando en Nemesitio, mi adversario. Cuanto más averiguo sobre él, más lo veo como un vago reflejo de mí misma. Un reflejo distorsionado, quizá... pero demasiado familiar. Igual que yo, él se vio obligado a recorrer el camino de la servidumbre desde una edad muy temprana, despojado de todo cuanto pudiese interponerse en el camino del deber; un adalid y fanático al que no le quedaba nada salvo un ideal, forjado y atemperado por su mentor».

languages.text: 「敵であるネメサイトについて考えているわ。彼について知れば知るほど、自分の姿がぼんやりと浮かび上がってくるの。ひねくれた自省かもしれないけど…あまりにも見覚えがある。私と同じように彼は幼い頃から隷属の道を歩むことを余儀なくされて、義務の邪魔になるものはすべて排除されてきたのよ。王者と熱狂者とは、その指導者が生み出して曲げられたアイデアでしかない」
languages.original_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."

traits.locale_text: 「敵であるネメサイトについて考えているわ。彼について知れば知るほど、自分の姿がぼんやりと浮かび上がってくるの。ひねくれた自省かもしれないけど…あまりにも見覚えがある。私と同じように彼は幼い頃から隷属の道を歩むことを余儀なくされて、義務の邪魔になるものはすべて排除されてきたのよ。王者と熱狂者とは、その指導者が生み出して曲げられたアイデアでしかない」

languages.text: “我一直在思考我的宿敌涅墨斯特。我越是了解他，就越能在他身上模糊地看到我自己的影子。或许那是扭曲的倒影……但这一切实在是太熟悉了。他和我一样，从小就被迫踏上奴役之路，被剥夺了可能妨碍职责的一切。他是个斗士，也是个狂热分子，除了理想之外什么都没有。他的导师将他锻造、锤炼成了现在的样子。”
languages.original_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."

traits.locale_text: “我一直在思考我的宿敌涅墨斯特。我越是了解他，就越能在他身上模糊地看到我自己的影子。或许那是扭曲的倒影……但这一切实在是太熟悉了。他和我一样，从小就被迫踏上奴役之路，被剥夺了可能妨碍职责的一切。他是个斗士，也是个狂热分子，除了理想之外什么都没有。他的导师将他锻造、锤炼成了现在的样子。”

languages.text: « Je pense à Némésite, mon adversaire. Plus j'en apprends à son sujet, plus je vois en lui un vague reflet de ma propre personne. Un reflet distordu, peut-être... mais dangereusement familier. Tout comme moi, on l'a forcé à suivre dès son plus jeune âge la voie de la servitude et on l'a privé de tout ce qui risquait de le détourner de son devoir... tel un champion et un fanatique entièrement dévoué à un idéal, forgé et galvanisé par son mentor. »
languages.original_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense à Némésite, mon adversaire. Plus j'en apprends à son sujet, plus je vois en lui un vague reflet de ma propre personne. Un reflet distordu, peut-être... mais dangereusement familier. Tout comme moi, on l'a forcé à suivre dès son plus jeune âge la voie de la servitude et on l'a privé de tout ce qui risquait de le détourner de son devoir... tel un champion et un fanatique entièrement dévoué à un idéal, forgé et galvanisé par son mentor. »

languages.text: "Düşmanım Nemezit'i düşünüyorum. Onun hakkında bir şeyler öğrendikçe, onda kendi yansımamın muğlak bir hâlini görmeye başlıyorum. Çarpık bir yansıma belki ama yine de çok tanıdık. Tıpkı benim gibi o da genç yaştan itibaren hizmet yolunda yürümeye zorlanmış, vazifesine engel olabilecek her türlü şeyden arındırılmış. Mentoru tarafından yaratılmış ve şekillendirilmiş, elinde tek bir idealden başka bir şey kalmamış bir müdafi ve bir bağnaz."
languages.original_text: "I am thinking about Nemesite, my adversary. The more I learn about him, the more I see a vague reflection of myself. A twisted reflection, perhaps... but all too familiar. Like me, he was forced to tread the path of servitude from an early age, stripped of anything that might stand in the way of duty — a champion and a zealot left with nothing but an idea, forged and tempered by his mentor."
